name: [B] Arena
description:
Attack enemies in their weak spot with your dash. The weak spot is marked by the colored line(s)

Your one stat bar in the middle bottom of the screen is both your health as well as your resource for your abilities.   

the symbols above your stat bar indicate if you have enough stamina to perform the attack in the shown direction. There is a system set up to help you not kill yourself by dashing, but in some situations you are able to, so be aware of the state of your 4 dash indicators.

Attack enemies to regain your resource or dodge them as it slowly regenerates itself.

At every thousand points you can upgrade it, but the enemies will grow stronger to follow.

Time your dashes well and you can do a vertical dash during a horizontal dash, or vice versa!

Controls:

A/D to move Left/Right

Space to Jump

Left/Right/Down while jumping to perform dashes in those directions

Up while jumping to switch gravity and dash

P to turn off Image effects if they annoy you.
